Title: Tides of War.
Subtitle: A Novel of Alcibiades and the Peloponnesian War.

Description: Presents the story of the great Athenian warrior and general Alcibiades, from his great victories on behalf of Athens to his later alliances with Sparta and Persia and his role in the eventual downfall of Athens..
